options.name: Diplomat
options.description: Gain +1 Negotiation, +1 Behavior, and +1 Presence. You can speak one additional language of your choice.

options.name: Body Language Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior. You can detect lies with advantage on your Behavior check.

options.name: Persuasive Speech
options.description: Gain +1 Negotiation. You can convince a neutral NPC to perform a non-dangerous task for you.

options.name: Cultural Expert
options.description: Gain +1 Xenology and knowledge of cultural protocols. You have advantage on social checks when interacting with different species or cultures.

options.name: Action : De-escalation
options.description: Make a Negotiation check to attempt to end a conflict peacefully. If successful, hostile creatures become neutral for 1 minute.

options.name: Reaction : Diplomatic Immunity
options.description: When you or an ally would be targeted by an attack, make a Presence check. If successful, the attacker must choose a different target or lose their action.

options.name: Inspiring Presence
options.description: Gain +1 Presence. You and allies within 30 feet gain advantage on saves against fear and charm effects.

options.name: Action : Diplomatic Solution
options.description: Make a Negotiation check against a hostile creature. If successful, you can establish a temporary truce and open negotiations.

options.name: Polyglot
options.description: Learn three additional languages of your choice. You can understand the general meaning of any spoken language after listening to it for 1 minute.

options.name: Master Diplomat
options.description: Gain +1 to all Social Skills. Once per day, you can automatically succeed on a social interaction check. Even hostile creatures will listen to your proposals.
